search_intent.content_strategy: Educational guide with legal focus and practical template integration. Informational intent dominates (59.6%), making comprehensive educational content critical. Commercial elements (download templates, legal expertise positioning) should be secondary.

rank_1_analysis.why_it_ranks: Direct match for transactional intent + established domain authority. Users searching for 'Pferdekaufvertrag' want templates/downloads immediately.

rank_1_analysis.gap_vs_rank1: We can differentiate by providing EDUCATION + template (hybrid), not just template

format_recommendations.featured_snippet_reasoning: No featured snippets currently rank for keyword. List format aligns with educational intent and has high click-through potential.

competitor_landscape.ranking_stability_reasoning: High-authority sites and specialized law firms dominate. Mix of legal expertise + practical resources.
competitor_landscape.new_entrant_reasoning: Legal authority dominates but content is often technical. Educational, beginner-friendly content with templates has opportunity. ehorses (rank 5) shows non-specialist can rank with good content.
competitor_landscape.assessment: High-authority legal sites dominate, but opportunities exist for educational differentiation. PferdeWert can compete by: 1) Simplifying legal content, 2) Creating interactive tools, 3) Integrating templates with explanations, 4) Addressing beginner pain points.

eeat_signals.credentials_reasoning: 4 of top 10 results are law firms/Rechtsanwälte. Legal expertise critical for this topic.
eeat_signals.recommended_approach: Partner with legal expert (Rechtsanwalt) for content review. Include expert credentials prominently. Cite BGB references, court decisions (BGH), legal precedents.

keywords_from_phase1_alignment.integration_notes: Phase 1 identified 'pferdekaufvertrag fn' (140 SV, high CPC €1.71) and 'privat ohne gewährleistung' (260 SV) as high-value variations. Content should address both FN-standard contracts and private sales specifically.
